name: The Forest of Origin
description:
As a rite of passage for your village, you set off on a quest through a treacherous forest. Will you make it back home? Or, will you find something more waiting for you in the deep woods? Encounter strange weapons and make decisions to either accept or reject the path that they try to put you on. Explore the deepest corners of the forest and you might just emerge a hero or a villain- if you emerge at all.

Game created by Erin Overton
